column1: Little Goat Diner////Omg this place was so delicious!! One of many stops on our day adventure
column2: we decided to break for lunch and stop in. All of us got a variety of dishes but I got the shrimp salad that had apples
column5: tortilla bits and so much flavor. Every bite had a great combination of citrus flavor
column6: shrimp and crunch. The salad mix of arugula and spinach provided a nice bitter counter balance and nothing was wilted or spoiled.
